channel.title: turbo on Joel Guerra
channel.description: Recent content in turbo on Joel Guerra

item.title: Let's Turbo Charge a Honda CR-V
item.description: This is not necessarily a “how to” but more of a “how I did it” because with something this custom there isn’t just one way to do it. This was my journey… oh, and links to parts and tools are affiliate links and I may earn a couple bucks if you buy them. If you’ve ever sat in a first generation Honda CR-V you knew you were sitting in a masterpiece.
